bibl.title: Notes on two Herodotean Papyri
bibl.note: Restorations of two passages of Herodotean papyri. - 1. P. Duke Inv. 756 (= M-P.3 474.11; LDAB 1119). Herodotus IV, 144, 2 - 145, 1. - 2. P. Oxy. XLVIII, 3381 (= M-P.3 480.1; LDAB 1138). Herodotus VII, 169-170.
bibl.seg: Andrzej Mirończuk, Notes on Two Herodotean Papyri.
Raccolta di scritti dedicati a Orsolina Montevecchi. III = Aegyptus 90 (2010 [2013]) pp. 37-39.

Restorations of two passages of Herodotean papyri. - 1. P. Duke Inv. 756 (= M-P.3 474.11; LDAB 1119). Herodotus IV, 144, 2 - 145, 1. - 2. P. Oxy. XLVIII, 3381 (= M-P.3 480.1; LDAB 1138). Herodotus VII, 169-170.
